    • personalID

      public static boolean personalID(String personalID)
      Checks if a string matches the pattern for a Finnish personal ID and if the personal ID has already been entered for another contact.
      Parameters:
      personalID - a String containing a personal ID
      Returns:
      true if the input matches the pattern and is not a duplicate, else false

      public static boolean phoneNum(String phoneNum)

      Returns:
      true if the input matches the pattern and is not a duplicate, else false

    • email

      public static boolean email(String email)
      Checks if a string matches the pattern for an email address. and if the email address has already been entered for another contact
      Parameters:
      email - a String containing an email address
      Returns:
      true if the input matches the pattern and it is not a duplicate, else false

    • address

      public static boolean address(String address)
      Checks if a string containing an address meets minimum length requirements.
      Parameters:
      address - a String containing an address
      Returns:
      true if the address length is greater than or equal to 3, else false

    • answerNumber

      public static int answerNumber(int min, int max)
      Validates user input when program is expecting an integer.
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum value that is accepted
      max - the maximum value that is accepted
      Returns:
      a valid integer input
